io.atomix.primitive

Class AbstractAsyncPrimitive<A extends AsyncPrimitive>

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.atomix.primitive.AbstractAsyncPrimitive<A>
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    AsyncPrimitive, DistributedPrimitive
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    AbstractAsyncPrimitiveProxy

    public abstract class AbstractAsyncPrimitive<A extends AsyncPrimitive>
extends Object
implements AsyncPrimitive
    Abstract base class for primitives that interact with Raft replicated state machines via proxy.
